name: arbitrary-emitter
description: Event emitter with ES6 Map sugar for modern browsers and node.js

scripts.build-umd: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp umd-assets/preumd.txt dist/arbitrary-emitter.umd.js && cat arbitrary-emitter.js >> dist/arbitrary-emitter.umd.js && sed -i '$d' dist/arbitrary-emitter.umd.js && cat umd-assets/postumd.txt >> dist/arbitrary-emitter.umd.js
scripts.build: npm run build-umd && npm run build-tests

author: Jacobo Tabernero
